Description.Text:
One of the island’s finest beachfront resorts, offers the most elegant guest rooms and spacious suites, while gorgeous palm - dotted tropical gardens and small waterfalls frame a stunning view of the Agean Sea” The hotel’s atmospheric design with it’s broad terraces, marble floors ,high ceilings, and skylights, draws inspiration from the Egyptian domination in Thassos ,three centuries ago.
Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct-dial phone, Music, radio- CD player, Safe box. Jacuzzi.
Three restaurants and four bars surrounding this “must” destination
Ilio Mare can easily combine business and leisure with outstanding service, exceptional comfort and every modern convenience, having just the right spaces for conferences up to 500 people ,business meetings , weddings or social events. Hair salon, nail salon, beauty treatments, massage, ,gift shop ,mini market, gym, cinema , kid’s club from 4- 11 years, play ground, floodlit tennis, beach volley included also in Hotel’s facilities.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Beach - 30m. Just 20 kilometres from Kavala airport or 220 kilometres from Thessaloniki airport (including the boat trip) Tranfer services can be provided upon request.
